title: A Stunning Admission In Court Which Changes Everything (Ep 1666)
description:
Absolutely disgusting! Despite the unfathomable tragedy in the Midwest, the Biden team is using it to advance their bogus global warming narrative. I also address a stunning court admission by Facebook which proves they’re NOT neutral. 

News Picks:


The CBO score for Biden’s spending plan is disastrous. 

The federal government has collected record tax revenue this past year, and we’re STILL running deficits. 

Twitter is suppressing the truth about covid and vaccines.

About 75% of Omicron cases are among the vaccinated.


Chris Wallace is out at Fox.

No, hurricanes and storms aren’t getting worse.


The disturbing racial crime you haven’t heard about.

Facebook finally admits “fact-checking” is a farce.


Newsguard is a scam.
